page.title: 20The Hamlet of Barr. Credits
page.content:
Barr House is owned by Lord and Lady Skelmersdale and it lies in the tiny hamlet called Barr just below Bishops Hull. Lord Skelmersdale was at a party political conference at Blackpool but we spoke to his wife. He is a Government Whip (which is a Minister of the Government in the House of Lords). He has also been a Lord-in-Waiting to the Queen since 1981, and is President of the Somerset Trust for Nature Conservation. He owns a large house and runs Broadleigh Gardens, where there is a bulb nursery occasionally open to the public.
{The research in this block was done by {some boys from Taunton Junior School {as a voluntary hobby, and then was {finished by Form 5M in October 1985 as {a class project with help from Miss C. {Spearey, Mr.B.Brown, & Mr.R.Craddock.
